about.title: About Jynx
about.subtitle: Transforming gaming from solo to social

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Jynx was born from a simple question: why is it so hard to find compatible gaming teammates? As gamers ourselves, we've experienced the frustration of random matchmaking systems that just don't get it right.
story.p2: We envisioned a platform that truly understands gamers - one that matches players based not just on skill, but on communication style, play preferences, and even gaming schedules.
story.p3: Today, Jynx is transforming the way gamers connect, creating meaningful gaming relationships that extend beyond the match.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe gaming is better together. Our mission is to transform solo gaming into rich social experiences by intelligently connecting players who truly complement each other.
mission.p2: We're building a future where finding your perfect gaming squad is seamless, where communities thrive around shared interests, and where every gaming session is with people you actually enjoy playing with.

values.title: Our Values
values.community: Community First - We empower gamers to build meaningful connections
values.inclusivity: Inclusivity - Gaming is for everyone, and so is Jynx
values.innovation: Innovation - We're constantly evolving based on what gamers need
values.quality: Quality Experience - No compromises on user experience or performance

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We're a passionate team of gamers, developers, and community builders dedicated to transforming how players connect.

cta.title: Join the Jynx Community
cta.description: Be the first to experience a new way of finding your perfect gaming squad

meta.title: Jynx | Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how Jynx protects your privacy and handles your data. Our transparent privacy policy outlines our practices and your rights.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.p1: Welcome to Jynx! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website or mobile application.
intro.p2: By using Jynx, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We only collect and use personal data when we need it for legitimate business purposes.

information.title: Information We Collect
information.p1: When you create a Jynx account or interact with our services, we may collect the following types of information:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.email: Email address (for account creation and notifications)
personal.profile: Optional profile information you choose to provide

usage.title: Usage Information
usage.interactions: Interaction data with other users and communities

technical.title: Technical Information
technical.ip: IP address and general location data

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.p1: We use the collected information for various purposes, including:
use.account: To create and maintain your account
use.features: To provide and improve our core matchmaking and community features
use.personalize: To personalize your experience and recommend relevant content
use.communicate: To communicate with you about service updates and offers
use.security: To ensure the security and integrity of our platform

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.p1: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sharing.service: With service providers who help us operate our platform
sharing.legal: When required by law or to protect our legal rights
sharing.business: In connection with a business transaction (e.g., merger or acquisition)
sharing.consent: With your consent or at your direction

security.title: Data Security
security.p1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
security.p2: While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. We encourage you to use strong passwords and keep your account information secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.p1: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:
rights.access: The right to access the personal data we hold about you
rights.rectification: The right to request correction of inaccurate data
rights.deletion: The right to request deletion of your data
rights.restriction: The right to restrict processing of your data
rights.objection: The right to object to the processing of your data
rights.p2: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.p1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and deliver personalized content. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect the functionality of our services.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.p1: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.p1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "last updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically.
